com.squidtopusstudios.zerobitengine.refact.util

Class Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.squidtopusstudios.zerobitengine.refact.util.Logger
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConsoleLogger

    public abstract class Logger
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract Logger class providing extended functionality like caller class, method and line number

      • write

      • setLogLevel

        public void setLogLevel(int logLevel)
        Wrapper for Gdx.app.setLogLevel simply encapsulate all logging functionality While this is more logical as a static method, accessing everything under one roof (Zbe) is easier to use
        Parameters:
        logLevel - Logging level (int) to set: Logger.LOG_NONE: mutes all logging. Logger.LOG_DEBUG: logs all messages. Logger.LOG_ERROR: logs only error messages. Logger.LOG_INFO: logs error and normal messages.
